ccre.holders

Class TuningContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.holders.TuningContext

  • public class TuningContext
extends java.lang.Object
    A TuningContext represents a context in which variables can be saved and published to the network.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected CluckNode enc
      The node to publish the value to.
      protected StorageSegment seg
      The segment to store the value in.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TuningContext(CluckNode enc, StorageSegment seg)
      Create a new TuningContext from a specified CluckNode and a specified StorageSegment.
      TuningContext(CluckNode node, java.lang.String storageName)
      Create a new TuningContext from a specified CluckNode and name of storage (used to find the StorageSegment)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flush()
      Flush the StorageSegment - save the current value.
      FloatStatus getFloat(java.lang.String name, float default_)
      Get a FloatStatus with the specified name and default value.
      FloatStatus getFloat(java.lang.String name, float default_, java.lang.String targetref)
      Get a FloatStatus with the specified name, default value, and the name of a encoded channel for a FloatInputProducer that should be an option to tune the variable to.
      EventConsumer getFlushEvent()
      Get an event that flushes this object.
      TuningContext publishSavingEvent(java.lang.String name) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TuningContext

        public TuningContext(CluckNode node,
             java.lang.String storageName)
        Create a new TuningContext from a specified CluckNode and name of storage (used to find the StorageSegment)
        Parameters:
        node - the CluckNode to share values over.
        storageName - the storage name to save values to.

      • TuningContext

        public TuningContext(CluckNode enc,
             StorageSegment seg)
        Create a new TuningContext from a specified CluckNode and a specified StorageSegment.
        Parameters:
        enc - the CluckNode to share values over.
        seg - the segment to save values to.

    • Method Detail

      • getFloat

        public FloatStatus getFloat(java.lang.String name,
                   float default_)
        Get a FloatStatus with the specified name and default value. This will be tunable over the network and saved on the cRIO once flush() is called.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the tunable value.
        default_ - the default value.
        Returns:
        the FloatStatus representing the current value.

      • getFloat

        public FloatStatus getFloat(java.lang.String name,
                   float default_,
                   java.lang.String targetref)
        Get a FloatStatus with the specified name, default value, and the name of a encoded channel for a FloatInputProducer that should be an option to tune the variable to. This will be tunable over the network and saved on the cRIO once flush() is called.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the tunable value.
        default_ - the default value.
        targetref - the name of the shared value for the tuning's default.
        Returns:
        the FloatStatus representing the current value.

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Flush the StorageSegment - save the current value.

      • getFlushEvent

        public EventConsumer getFlushEvent()
        Get an event that flushes this object.
        Returns:
        the EventConsumer that will flush this object.
        See Also:
        flush()

      • publishSavingEvent

        public TuningContext publishSavingEvent(java.lang.String name)
